document_data.caption: A map of the [[Easting Reach]] showing the location of Guidodale.
document_data.name: Guidodale
document_data.georefs: {{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dragon/346/Impiltur: The Forgotten Kingdom|62}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Maracrath''' was a village located in [[Impiltur]] in the [[Northeast Faerûn]], off the coast of the [[Easting Reach]]{{Cite dragon annual/1999/Speaking in Tongues|26}}
document_data.Geography: Guidodale was known as one of several overnight stops for caravans that traveled along the [[Merchant's Run]], part of the [[Herald's Road]] that stretched between Impiltur and the [[Cold Lands]]. Guidodale stood on a crossroad where the road from [[Timbertown]] to the northwest joined Merchant's Run. The town itself was located between [[Maracrath]] to the southeast and [[Mulltown]] to the northwest.
document_data.Defenses: Guidodale received protection from [[Ilmwatch]]'s garrison contingents that traveled with merchant caravans between the Cold Lands and the Easting Reach.
